meanings.definition: An alkaloid found in peyote (Lophophora williamsii).
meanings.english_definition: An alkaloid found in peyote (Lophophora williamsii).

examples.sentence: Anhalouidine is one of the many psychoactive compounds in peyote.
examples.translation: アンハロウイジンは、ペヨーテに含まれる多くの精神活性化合物の一つです。

etymology.value: Derived from Anhalonium lewinii, an older scientific name for peyote.
